title: Tilt Free Zone Club Invitations

embed.description: Funny League of Legends Meme - Solucian www.leaguememe.com

body: hey everyone, if anyone out there is looking for a easy going club to join with chilled out player base who play games frequently with each other then just add us on league for invite to club. Only thing we ask is that your friendly and you enjoy to play the game, doesnt matter if your unranked, bronze, silver, gold, platinum, diamond, master or challenger, we all get along and just want to enjoy ourselves aswell as do the best we can :D like I said if ur interested by all means just message me for invite and well go from there, looking forward to seeing you on the rift.
